name: Cursed Kingdom (Majadroid)
description:
Cursed Kingdom is a strategic medival puzzle game.

Your Kingdom is invaded by demons. You have to strategically place small villages and watchtowers to collect gold and defeat enemy buildings.
This is more a puzzle game than a strategy game. The enemies won't move. You have to find the right spots and the right bulding order for your buildings, in order to succeed.

Controls:
- The game is controlled by mouse. Click in the menu to select a building, then click on a green grid postion to place it on the map. You can right click to deselect the building.
- Use the UNDO button to undo your building steps. You will get back your spent gold.
- You can zoom in and out with the mouse wheel. You can move the map with the cursor keys or wasd.

This game is my entry for Ludum Dare 51.
